metadata.title: CVE-2022-45417 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Service Workers did not detect Private Browsing Mode correctly in allcases, which could have led to Service Workers being written to disk forwebsites visited in Private Browsing Mode. This would not have persistedthem in a state where they would run again, but it would have leakedPrivate Browsing Mode details to disk. This vulnerability affects Firefox <107.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
